channel.title: Add A command to a Item? Rep++ for help
channel.description:
I need to figure out how to add a command, that automatically enables when you put on an item.
EX: Platebody with wings, Put it on and you get God Mode. Please include what makes the command turn off when you take off the item. Rep++ for help :)

item.title: Add A command to a Item? Rep++ for help
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 10000) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149); sendMessage("The angelic helmet grants you weightlessness, and you begin to fly!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

(I think.)

Evo beat me to it :D.

Read full topic
item.source: Add A command to a Item? Rep++ for help

item.title: Add A command to a Item? Rep++ for help
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

I just made this, so anyine assuming I leeched I did’nt.

Declare this method,

public void GodMode() { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4212) { sendMessage("With the power of your platebody, you activate God mode!"); stillgfx(437, 0, 0); playerEnergy = 100; currentHealth += 75; if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; } else { sendMessage("You're not wearing the sacred platebody! God mode will not activate!"); } }

And under,

public void customcommand

Add,

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Godmode")) { GodMode(); sendMessage("You enable God mode!"); } else { sendMessage("You are unable to activate God mode!"); }

Remember for the GodMode method you can edit the GFX and the sendMessage. What it does;

[ul][li]Reset’s your run energy to 100[/li]
[li]Give’s you some HP[/li]
[li]Send’s a message[/li][/ul]

[size=13pt]Remember to change the weapon here ID,[/size]

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == [u][b]4212[/b][/u]) {

Read full topic
